description: Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block
name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation
query: process.command_line:/\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[/ OR process.command_line:/\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[/ OR process.command_line:/\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[/ OR process.command_line:/\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}/ OR process.command_line:/\*mdr\*\W\s*\)\.Name/ OR process.command_line:/\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\(/ OR process.command_line:/\[String\]\s*\$VerbosePreference/
author: Daniel Bohannon (@Mandiant/@FireEye), oscd.community
